thread.title: Giles Harvey
thread.title_full: Country Attire Ltd. (www.countryattire.com) reviewed by Giles Harvey

author: Giles Harvey
title: Giles Harvey
text:
Ordered a pair of Doc Martens that were merchandised as leather. When I received them they were vegan. The company can now not tell me if the rest of the stock is vegan or if it was a mistake. It's clear they don't know what they have in stock versus what's on the website.
Update: have spoken to Michael today and he has resolved the issue by checking the stock and confirmed the correct pair are now on their way. Have updated score to 4 because of his polite, quick and efficient response. Well done Michael.
